job_description:
Company: Oak Street Health

Title: Director, Enterprise Analytics

Location: Chicago, IL / Remote

Role Description

Oak Street Health is looking for a Director, Enterprise Analytics to join our broader Data Science and Analytics team. Reporting to the VP of Analytics this individual will act as a senior leader guiding several analytics teams including Patient Experience, Service Operations, and Growth. Responsibilities include leading analytics manager (and their teams), extensive partnerships with OSHâs population health, clinical operational teams, and senior leadership on projects of strategic importance, and roadmap management for the Enterprise Analytics teams. This is a fast-paced role with high growth, visibility, impact, and where your strategic input and insight will directly shape the organizationâs direction.

Key Responsibilities
• Sets the strategy and direction for the Enterprise Analytics teams
• Expert in eliciting business requirements from various stakeholders
• Partners with VP and other leaders to develop and execute the roadmap
• Directly leads the technical and people management of data & analytics teams
• Responsible for ensuring technical excellence with reports, dashboards, and other analytical products
• Other duties as assigned

What weâre looking for
• Minimum of 4-6 years of healthcare or life sciences experience
• Minimum of 2 years of an analytically focused leadership position
• Graduate education (PhD, DrPH, MS, MPH, etc.) preferred
• Expert data visualization skills (Tableau preferred)
• Expert SQL skills
• Expert leadership skills with the willingness to devote a subset of time to delivering analytical products
• Working knowledge of R or Python preferred
• Strong strategic planning skills
• The ability to work with other leaders to develop and execute analytical strategies
• Strong Project & Product Management skills
• The ability to lead in a matrix organization
• Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
• US work authorization
• Someone who embodies being âOakyâ

What does being âOakyâ look like?
• Radiating positive energy
• Assuming good intentions
• Creating an unmatched patient experience
• Driving clinical excellence
• Taking ownership and delivering results
• Relentlessly Determined

Why Oak Street Health?

Oak Street Health is on a mission to âRebuild healthcare as it should be'', providing personalized primary care for older adults on Medicare, with the goal of keeping patients healthy and living life to the fullest. Our innovative care model is centered right in our patientâs communities, and focused on the quality of care over volume of services. Weâre an organization on the move! With over 150 locations and an ambitious growth trajectory, Oak Street Health is attracting and cultivating team members who embody âOakyâ values and passion for our mission.

Oak Street Health Benefits:
• Mission-focused career impacting change and measurably improving health outcomes for medicare patients
• Paid vacation, sick time, and investment/retirement 401K match options
• Health insurance, vision, and dental benefits
• Opportunities for leadership development and continuing education stipends
• New centers and flexible work environments
• Opportunities for high levels of responsibility and rapid advancement

Oak Street Health is an equal opportunity employer. We embrace diversity and encourage all interested readers to apply.

Learn more at www.oakstreethealth.com/diversity-equity-and-inclusion-at-oak-street-health
